titleStmt.title: Obiectorum reductio: or, Daily imployment for the soule In occasional meditations upon severall subjects. By Donald Lupton.
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Donald, d. 1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for Iohn Rothvveli [sic], at the signe of the Sunne, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-L (-L8).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne, in Pauls Church-yard
